messages.subject: "Mage" and hairstyle
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I am currently looking for some information (and hopefully some pictures) about hairstyles showing one s status, focused on sengoku era. Does anybody has
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

I am currently looking for some information (and hopefully some
pictures)
about hairstyles showing one's status, focused on sengoku era.
Does anybody has some information about this? I think that buke had a
specific mage but i think that other casts had also specific ones,
and that
there were more than one hairstyle for a specific cast. Was it true?
Any
Extra info?

Thank you,

Jerome.
